extendedInfo.description: If you are A Skylit Drive's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check A Skylit Drive's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all A Skylit Drive's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of A Skylit Drive's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Wires...and the Concept of Breathing- Adelphia- Identity On Fire************************List of lyrics ************************- 400 Ft. Robots- 500 Days Of Bummer- Air The Enlightenment- All It Takes For Your Dreams To Come True- Balance- Black And Blue- Carry The Broken- City On The Edge Of Forever- Conscience Is A Killer- Eris & Dysnomia- Eva The Carrier- Ex Marks The Spot- Ex-Machina- Fuck The System- Heaven- I Swear This Place Is Haunted- Identity On Fire- If You Lived Here You'd Be Home- I'm Not A Thief, I'm A Treasure Hunter- It's Not Ironic It's Obvious- Knights Of The Round- My Disease- Prelude To A Dream- Pursuit Lets Wisdom Ride The Wind- Running With The Light- See You Around- Sleepwalker- Tempt Me, Temptation- Thank God It's Cloudy Cause I'm Allergic To Sunlight- The Boy Without A Demon- The Cali Buds- The Children Of Adelphia- This Isn't The End- Those Cannons Could Sink A Ship- Too Little Too Late- Wires And The Concept Of Breathing- XO Skeleton- Your Mistake

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: It\'s missing a few songs. It\'s missing my favorite song by A Skylut Drive called Drown The City. If that could be fixed that\'d be great. Still a good app
reviews.author: Keith McLean-Cortes
